title: Bug 121682: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table containing highlight and map
description:
Description: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from the attached report.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table to the report containing a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
OB: When attempting to export the data from the table containing a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule, an exception is thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
EB: The data from the table should be exported without any exceptions being thrown.
SR:
1. Add a table to the report containing a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
